SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking

Klasse CombatTracker

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.combattracking.CombatTracker
public class CombatTracker extends Object
Combat tracking system. You need to call onPlayerDamage(UUID, UUID, double) when a player is damaged by a player and onPlayerDeath(UUID) when the player died. You also need to call task() every second. If you call onPlayerDeath(UUID), you will get the current player fight returned, which contains the information about all players involved in this fight. Look at PlayerFight to see how to use it.

  • Methodendetails

    • task

      public void task()
      Counts down the expiration countdowns. Call every second.

    • onPlayerDamage

      public double onPlayerDamage(@NotNull @NotNull UUID player, @NotNull @NotNull UUID damager, double damage)
      Adds player damage. Should be called in damage events.
      Parameter:
      player - the damaged player
      damager - the player who dealt the damage
      damage - the amount of damage
      Gibt zurück:
      the amount of damage the player who dealt the damage has dealt in total

    • onPlayerDeath

      @Nullable public @Nullable PlayerFight onPlayerDeath(@NotNull @NotNull UUID playerId)
      Removes a combat. Should be called on player death.
      Parameter:
      playerId - the player who died
      Gibt zurück:
      the player fight for using the tracked data
